data.title: Novi Sad & Sremski Karlovci in Belgrade, Serbia
data.meta_description: Spend a full day with a private guide and air-conditioned vehicle visiting the beautiful town of Novi Sad a European Capital of Culture in 2021. Visit Petrovaradin fortress (Gibraltar on the Danube) built by Austro-Hungarian empire in 17 century that has a lot of stories to tell. Discover the town of Sremski Karlovci with a baroque town square, the town was a center of Serbian literacy through history and also a town of great vineyards with quality wines. Hear stories about Bermet wine and history of Karlovci. On this tour, you will visit one of Fruska Gora monasteries from 16th century…
